ComicInfo.Title: The Tickle Me Elmo Rip-Offs; 10 Really Bad Class Field Trips; ...Lawyer, Lawyer!; More Bad Hobbies; Rednecks... or Poor White Trash?; Internet Sites That Hardly Anybody Visits; The Natural Examineder; The New Cracked School; The Real Private Farts; Brutually Honest Fortune Cookies; Which Is the Bigger Disaster... a Volanic Eruption or the Movie Dante's Peak?; Cracked's Driving Exam; Dinner Plans at Sea; More Baseball Rule Changes to Make the Game Semi-Interesting; The Michael Jackson Baby Book; Duhbrina the Teenage Witch
ComicInfo.Writer: Greg Grabianski,Joseph Reiter,Mike Sacks,Eric Bohlen,Arnoldo Franchioni,Lou Silverstone,Lenore Skenazy,R. Weske,Mike Ricigliano
